name: Elephant Quest
description: Elephant Quest is another web game from jmtb02 featuring the blue elephant from Achievement Unlocked. This time, the elephant's hat has been stolen by Wooly the bullying mammoth, so you must navigate several areas of platforming, complete fetch quests for your elephant peers, fend off monsters, and level up your skills in preparation for your final confrontation with Wooly. Unlike Achievement Unlocked, this game has a skill-tree.
